populateuserprofiles-confirm: Are you sure you want to populate existing users' profiles?
user-profile-edit-profile-update-saved: The user's profile was successfully saved
user-profile-edit-error-all-section: An error occurred while trying to save all the sections. The changes to the user profile were <u>not</u> saved.
user-profile-personal-email-needs-auth: (your email needs to be authenticated to receive site notifications)
user-profile-preferences-emails-manage: Email notifications are handled by the Echo extension. You can change these in your [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|preferences]].
user-profile-preferences-emails-friendfo: When another user friends or foes you
user-profile-picture-yourpicturestext: Below are the images that will appear on your profile, network pages, and on your comments.
user-profile-picture-picsize: Your image must be a jpeg, png, or gif and must be less than 100kb in size.
user-profile-create-threshold-picture-ga: {{PLURAL:$1|one picture game vote|$1 picture game votes}}
user-profile-create-threshold-quiz-corre: {{PLURAL:$1|one correctly answered quiz|$1 correctly answered quizzes}}
user-profile-create-threshold-reason: Sorry, you cannot create a user profile until you have at least $1
user-profile-error-spam: Error: Found spam in one or more of the profile field values. Please modify the value(s).
user-board-blocked-message: You are currently blocked and thus cannot post messages to other users.
user-board-login-message: You must be [[Special:UserLogin|logged in]] to post messages to other users
user-board-confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
removeavatar-already-default: This user is already using the default avatar, so there's nothing to remove here.
removeavatar-already-default-cta: Your avatar is already the default. Why not [[Special:UploadAvatar|upload]] an avatar?
toggleuserpage-confirm: Do you really want to change your user profile page type?
avatarupload-removesuccess: The avatar has been successfully removed
profilelogpagetext: This is a log of user profile edits
avatarlogpagetext: This is a log of user avatar uploads and removals.

right-editothersprofiles-private: View and update private information (email address) in other users' social profiles
right-populate-user-profiles: Populate other users' profiles for existing wikis
user-profile-error-no-api-edit: Editing social profiles via the API is not currently possible. Please use Special:UpdateProfile to edit your own user profile, or Special:EditProfile to edit other users' profiles (if you have the user rights needed to use that special page).
apihelp-socialprofile-userprofileprivacy: API module for setting the visibility ("privacy") of a profile field
Target field key, such as up_movies for the "Movies" field
New privacy value (public, hidden, friends, foaf)
apihelp-smpuserprofiletype-summary: Get a user's user page type or set your own user page type
apihelp-smpuserprofiletype-param-user: User name (only relevant when <kbd>do</kbd> is <kbd>get</kbd> as this module cannot be used to set other user's user page types, only your own)
